title: Good news for women with MS: Disease may not worsen after pregnancy after all

title_detail.value: Good news for women with MS: Disease may not worsen after pregnancy after all

summary: There's good news for women with multiple sclerosis (MS) -- researchers now say the disease may not flare up again right after pregnancy as they had long believed, according to a preliminary study. Most people with MS have the relapsing-remitting form of the disease, where symptoms flare up, then go into periods of remission.
